******************if you have the same problem as me..im using win 7 64 bit..once you extract all the stuff out delete the EAM 1.0.25 folder and delete the six "playerstats" text files and go to the players folder and delete all the STAT files...this will reset stuff in the system wich will alow you to see servers and join them...hope this helps some of you =]

if you cant see servers nor play...go to the EAM folder and delete the six "playerstats" text files, now go to the player folder and delete all the STAT files leaving only three files in that folder...this will reselt your level but it works...well at least for me...hope this helps some of you...win 7 64 bit..
